The State has done all the homework and paperwork. As a state agency or political subdivision, you may be eligible for the state of New York’s Fuel Card, contract PS65802 and save as much as 15%* off your overall fleet budget.
Sign up and take advantage of these unique benefits:
•NO setup fees or card fees •Valuable monthly discounts •Tax exemption and reporting for qualified fleets •Online account access and easy-to-read reports •Fuel and associated products •Customer Service 24 hours a day Use the Fuel Card Services contract #PS65802 to fuel your vehicles at over 90% of fuel stations nationwide.
Don’t miss out on your State’s FREE money-saving solution.
Sincerely,
